name: Pachtrinko
description:
Pachtrinko is simple. The longer you keep the ball in the play area, the higher your score!

As you move your mouse, the Pachtrinko triangles will turn to follow (you might need to click on the game area if they don't).

(This game was made in three hours for the Trijam #111, so don't expect too much!)

Attributions
